Room.Name: Vestibule of the Dragon Tooth Inn
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the plush vestibule of the luxurious Dragon Tooth Inn.
Room.LongDescription: The Dragon Tooth Inn has quite a history in the city of Oceancrest. At one time there was a hidden meeting room in the back part of the inn, and a group of anti-royalist terrorists met there. After a number of visiting Viscounts were murdered in their locked rooms, the inn was closed and the owner hanged. Now the inn is open again, under new management.
